entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then west 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along exposed areas of the coast. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
